Instance Method# beginSheet(using:on:completionHandler:)

macOS 14.0+

```
@MainActor
func beginSheet(
    using printInfo: NSPrintInfo,
    on parentWindow: NSWindow,
    completionHandler handler: ((NSPageLayout.Result) -> Void)? = nil
)
```
